sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This action deactivates user of Workplace by Facebook.

Inputs:

  • User ID - The Workplace by Facebook User ID.

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".

Error Messages:

  • User ID is not valid.
  • Either the access token is invalid or the access token lacks enough permission to perform this action.

Additional Note:

  • Once a user is deactivated, to activate the user again, a separate invitation mail needs to be sent to the user to claim the account.

To use this action, the corresponding Workplace by Facebook connection and credential must be created and associated with the Workplace by Facebook Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Deactivate User

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
This action deactivates user of Workplace by Facebook.

Inputs:

  • User ID - The Workplace by Facebook User ID.

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".

Error Messages:

  • User ID is not valid.
  • Either the access token is invalid or the access token lacks enough permission to perform this action.

Additional Note:

  • Once a user is deactivated, to activate the user again, a separate invitation mail needs to be sent to the user to claim the account.

To use this action, the corresponding Workplace by Facebook connection and credential must be created and associated with the Workplace by Facebook Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
